honors_and_awards.title: 2nd position, Kharagpur Data Science Hackathon 2021
honors_and_awards.description: 1. Secured second position in KDSH 2021 among 3000+ teams from universities all over India 2. Proposed a solution for the identification and classification of bus operators under price leaders, price followers, and independent price-setters, given past time-series data of prices for various operators 3. Applied Granger's causality and TLCC(Time lagged cross-correlation) techniques to find causality correlations among the bus operators and achieved concrete conclusions regarding the… Show more

honors_and_awards.title: National Finalist, Grid 2.0 Robotics Challenge
honors_and_awards.description: 1. Qualified as Top-9 National-Level finalist among 6000+ teams from universities all over India 2. Proposed the design and simulation for an Autonomous Stair Climbing Robot for it to be operated in warehouses 3. Designed a Load-bearing Robot capable of staircase identification, obstacle avoidance & autonomous stair traversal 4. Performed staircase identification using YOLO (You-Only-Look-Once) Object detection algorithm via stereo-camera attached to the robot 5. Handled Landmark… Show more
